title: NHS: Public satisfaction with health service drops to record low
description: Just 29% of Britons say they are satisfied, citing waiting times and lack of staff as key concerns.

title: Ministers can veto prisoners' parole in Victims and Prisoners Bill
description: The government has promised to make it easier for victims of crime in England and Wales to get justice.

title: Amsterdam launches 'stay away' ad campaign targeting young British men
description: The Dutch city targets UK men aged 18-35 in an ad campaign aimed at changing its reputation.

title: The Papers: 'Cruise ships' to house migrants and new NHS cash
description: Wednesday's headlines include new plans to house migrants on cruise ships and fresh cash for the NHS.

title: Nashville school shooter hid guns in parents' house
description: Police say the parents felt the suspect should not own weapons, but did not realise guns were in the house.

title: Tour Championship: Kyren Wilson says it has been important to talk about son's health issues
description: Kyren Wilson says speaking openly about his son Bailey's health issues has "freed" him up to enjoy playing snooker again.

description: Sensational Scotland take a seismic leap in their bid for consecutive European Championships by stunning Spain in a heroic triumph.
